description: Gather your forces and prepare for war in Clash of Lords! Bringing a fresh new spin to the world you know and love, experience true strategy mayhem unlike anything you've played before! Game Features: 1. Take Charge in Clash of Lords! Real-time command of your Heroes' battle skills. More Power = More Fun! 2. Mercenary Mania! Pair Heroes and Troops in Clash of Lords to form invincible teams with the all-new Mercenary mode! 3. Exhilarating & Easy-to-Play! Training troops is a thing of the past! Get into the heat of battle faster than ever with Clash of Lords! 4. The Wild Bunch Are Here in Clash of Lords! Choose from a cavalcade of Heroes each with unique skills and abilities!a 5. Play Your Way in Clash of Lords! Six battle modes of non-stop action. Master the Lords League, Resource Raids, Solo Campaigns, Hero Arena, Campaign Clash, and Battle Royale to reign supreme! 6. Guild Camaraderie! Rally your friends for more thrills and spills in Clash of Lords Guilds! 7. Free to Play! Log in to Clash of Lords every day to recruit free Heroes and win free Jewels! Visit our Facebook Fanpage at: https://www.facebook.com/ClashofLords Need more help? Email help.lords@igg.com with your IGG ID, we'll reply to you immediately!
release_text: Update Notes: 1. Demon Slayer has been revamped with a new look, stats boost, and skills evolution! 2. A new Friends and Private Message feature has been added! 3. Recruit new players with your invite code to win rewards! 4. New Fervor function has been added. Reset your Talents and fill the Fervor bar to score a max level Talent. 5. Landslide can't be teleported or knocked away by enemies while defending or stationed in Heroes Hall. Need help? Email help.lords@igg.com with your IGG ID.

description: Sammle deine Kräfte und mache dich bereit für die Kämpfe in Clash of Lords 2! Du kannst der Entwicklung der Welt, so wie du sie kennst eine völlig neue Wendung geben! Clash of Lords 2 liefert dir Strategie, wie du sie zuvor noch nie erlebt hast! Spielfunktionen: 1. Setze im Kampf die Fähigkeiten deiner Helden in Echtzeit ein! Mehr Kräfte = Mehr Spaß! 2. Söldner-Wahnsinn! Stelle ein unbesiegbares Team mit Helden und Truppen in dem nagelneuen Söldner-Modus zusammen! 3. Spannend und einfach zu Spielen! Es ist nun nicht mehr notwendig deine Truppen zu trainieren! 4. Die Wilde Truppen! Wähle aus einer Vielzahl von Helden aus, die alle einzigartige Fähigkeiten und Fertigkeiten besitzen! 5. Spiele 5 Kampf-Modi mit Aktion ohne Ende. Beherrsche die Modi Liga der Lords, Ressourcenüberfälle, Solofeldzüge, Heldenarena und Clash-Feldzug! 6. Führe deine Freunde in einer Gilde zusammen, um Clash of Lords mit noch mehr Spaß zu erleben! 7. Gratis zu spielen! Melde täglich im Spiel an, werbe gratis Helden an und bekomme kostenlose Juwelen! Besuche unsere Facebook-Fanseite auf: https://www.facebook.com/clashoflords2de Du brauchst Hilfe? Schreib mit deiner IGG ID an help.lords.de@igg.com . Gather your forces and get ready for the battles in Clash of Lords 2! You can develop the world as you know it give a whole new twist! Clash of Lords 2 provides you strategy, like you've never experienced before! Game features: 1 Set a fighting abilities of your heroes in real-time! More power = more fun! Second mercenary-madness! Place an invincible team with heroes and troops in the brand new mercenary mode! 3 exciting and easy to play! It is no longer necessary to train your troops! The 4th Wild troops! Choose from a variety of heroes, all of which have unique skills and abilities! 5 Games 5 battle modes with action without end. Dominant modes League of Lords, resource raids, solo campaigns, hero arena and Clash-campaign! 6 Lead to Clash of Lords to see your friends in a guild together with even more fun! 7 Free to play! Reporting daily to the game, rack of free heroes and get free jewels! Visit our Facebook-Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/clashoflords2de You need help? Write with your IGG ID to help.lords.de@igg.com .
release_text: 1.0.133 Änderungen: 1.Der neue Held Djinni feiert sein Debüt im Spiel! 2.Die neue Transmutationsfunktion ist im Spiel verfügbar. Verwandle epische Helden durch Transmutation in magisches Pulver, welches in Gegenstände getauscht werden kann. 3.Du kannst nun im Spiel jederzeit zwischen Grafik mit hoher und niedriger Auflösung wechseln. 4.Ein neues Feature mit Freundschaftpunkten kommt im Spiel dazu. 5.Das Heldendepot wird auf 200 Slots erweitert. Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/clashoflords2de

description: Ka-boom, the explosive world of Mini Toss is here! With dozens of maps to master, unlimited costumes, super-charged weapons, and powerful attacks - Mini Toss will literally blow you away! What are you waiting for? Join the adventure today! Background Story: Eons ago, the benevolent gods locked all the evils of the world inside a magical box and buried it deep under the earth. Long have the forces of darkness searched for this box, and at last, they have found it. Now, monsters and foul spirits of all kinds stalk the earth, and the Goddess of Hope has fallen into their sinister claws. While the world trembles, new heroes have risen from the darkness! Who will be the one to save us all? Fight, young hero, and the glory shall be yours! Game Features: - A beautiful fantasy world chock-full of quirky characters & mystical creatures! - Unique equipment system to customize and power up as you play! - PvP to your heart's content in Solo, Team, and Boss battles! - Tricky dungeons to test your skills and your wits! - Earn EXP even when you're not playing! - Join a Guild and defeat your rivals! Note: This game requires an internet connection. Mini Toss is now available on Android devices worldwide. Visit our Facebook Fanpage at: https://www.facebook.com/MiniTossEN Needs more help? Email [ help.minitoss@igg.com ] with your IGG ID, we'll reply to you ASAP!
release_text: fix some bugs

description: *** New word puzzle game in several languages with ranking & online competition *** Fun with Blanks! New & Addictive word filling game with several packs based on different topics!!! Word Fill is a addictive word puzzle game and casual game supporting all popular mobile devices. --------------------------- *** Game Facts *** - Word filling game with scores, ranking and online competition. - Each pack is based on a particular topic with nine levels. - Normal, Medium, Hard & Expert difficulty modes. - Challenge your skills in 4 difficulty modes in several packs. - Compete with thousands of players around the world. - Tap over the words to find their meaning from online dictionary. - Languages : English, Spanish, French, German, Italian & Portuguese. --------------------------- *** Game Play *** - Tap over blanks in the board and fill the missing letters to form words shown above it. - Find all the words in the list to complete the level. - Faster you find words higher the score & ranking. --------------------------- *** Other Features *** - Awesome graphics with fluid animations. - Choose your board size to match your skill. - All packs have individual player ranking system based on the highest Score achieved. - Your rank naturally improves along with your skill as you play again and again, thats what makes WordFill so addictive.
release_text: - Google play leader boards and achievements added. - Sharing and other social features added. - Few other improvements & bug fixes are done.

description: FlightHero is a flight-tracking app that provides a real time flight status information and helps you to know flight status, lets you to track a flight. Aware of the fact that is also shows a real time flightboard with arrivals and departures, airport traffic delays and a current airport weather in addition to a 10 day detailed weather forecast and synchronizes with your TripIt by Concur account(via In-App TripIt Sync AddOn). FlightHero Free has more than 1 million downloads and has been positively mentioned by Forbes, WSJ, CNN, cnet FlightHero has been in a top paid 10 travel apps in dozens countries including Germany, United States, Italy, United Kingdom, Russia and Japan. These features make FlightHero to be one of the best travel apps: FLIGHT STATUS • Actual position of the aircraft with the actual speed for most flights. Use it as your personal virtual flight radar to know the aircraft speed, latitude, longitude and the altitude NEARBY FLIGHTS • Nearby flights within 140 miles (200 km) including a tail number FLIGHT BOARD WITH ARRIVALS AND DEPARTURES IN REAL TIME • Auto-refresh with the ability to cache flights during offline mode • Advanced sorting order • Advanced filters: airlines, flight status, arrival and departure information and time range for the most effective sky scanning • 3 days (72 hours) time interval for arrivals and departures AIRLINES. THE LARGEST COVERAGE • 1500 airlines: commercial, cargo, charters AIRPORTS. THE LARGEST COVERAGE TOO • 16500 airports around the world • Nearby airports within 140 miles (200 km) SYNC • Sync flights with Calendar app • Sync flights with TripIt by Concur PUSH NOTIFICATIONS • Alerts on flight status changes CURRENT WEATHER AT THE AIRPORT AND AIRPORT TRAFFIC DELAYS • Delay on a 5-point scale with the 0.2 step • Actual temperature • Wind speed and direction • 15 day detailed weather forecast helps you stay dry when you grab your kayak for fishing on vacation TERMINAL PLANS • Available for major airports. Download all at once from the “Additional content” tab SEAT MAPS • Available for major airlines. Download all at once from the “Additional content” tab • Specifications for 400+ aircraft types MAPS USING GOOGLE MAPS • Live flight maps in 3 different modes: Standard, Satellite, Hybrid • Actual flight paths shown when available • Your actual current position • Road path from your current position to the airport FLIGHT SEARCH • By flight number and departure date • By route and departure date • Saves 10 recent flights and airports FAVORITES • Add flights and airports by swiping from the right to the left BOOKING • Hotels booking via booking.com • Cars booking via rentalcars.com CURRENCY CONVERTER • Exchange rate for the most currencies in the world SHARE INFORMATION ON FLIGHT STATUS • SMS • Email • Twitter • Facebook MULTILINGUAL • 29 Languages UNIVERSAL APP • Single version for Android Phones and Tablets
release_text: Bug fix

description: “SUBWAY KOREA” is beloved subway application, which has stepped one-step further from other ordinary applications. If you have any suggestion or idea, do not hesitate to tell us anytime anywhere! Please click the following link to write to us: subway@malangstudio.com “SUBWAY KOREA” offers the fastest official timetable of Seoul metro compared to other apps. Since the timetable changes every weekday and holiday, we deliver you the most accurate information through search algorithm derived from 6 years of expertise. “SUBWAY KOREA” provides subways maps for major cities, such as Seoul, Busan (Pusan), Daejeon, Gwangju and Daegu. [The Most Accurate and Fastest Subway Linemap Compare to Other Apps] -Provides the “official” subway timetable as it as (There may be a delay or change without notice depending on the operating situation of each line.) -Average period of DB (Timetable) is ## days! -Perfectly reflects any changes in timetable every day. -Supports Seoul subway map, Busan (Pusan) subway map, Daejeon subway map, Gwangju subway map, and Daegu subway map [Easy and Various Search Option] -Search by just typing consonants of subway station -Last Train Timetable Search by one touch -Freely setting the Subway Route by offering various options, such as: express train, slow train, transfer, and even the exit number. -Shows recently searched stations and routes. -Search algorithm with 10 years of expertise of “SUBWAY KOREA” [Considering the User Experience Improvements] -Uncrackable vector-based subway map -Improvement of zoom speed in subway map -Add destinations and transfer station alarm - Improved UI by adopting the Home screen master button -First to adopt social algorithms that improve user participation in the subway map app; Subway transfer station, Transfer time required, Exit information [Personalized UI Settings Available Various Options] - Provides the total of 30 custom screen types and subway information based on the language, area and unit - Allows users to set the bookmark as main page: Check the favorite station and route directly in first primary screen [More detail than anyone else! All-In-One Search Result] -Route Information: the time required / fare (including the early discount)/ transfer time / faster transfer door -Station information: exit door information / possibility of opposite crossing / restroom / breastfeeding facility / access for disabled / lift / station contact number -Exit information: provides information near the exit to Google Maps

description: Schools App is the best way to find classmates, get answers to questions, and stay connected on your college campus. Available for students at our 130+ participating colleges & universities including Syracuse University, University of Oregon, Stony Brook University, Northwest Arkansas Community College, Pace, University of Denver, UCLA, Columbia College Chicago, Gonzaga, California College of the Arts, Samford University, UCSB, and many, many more. What you can do: * Access a private network that is exclusive to students at your college. * Get answers to questions. * Stay current on upcoming events and deadlines. * Find a roommate. * Private message students and staff. * Find other students like you.
release_text: Favorites is now Follow: Tap the Follow button on profiles to get notified when the people you care about post to the feed.

description: Kids Shapes and Colors will not bombard your child with purchase requests. There is only ONE in-app purchase. The app contains six activities. Three are free. The remaining three are available for purchase with a SINGLE in-app purchase. Now that this house-keeping info is out of the way, let's talk about the app itself! Learning can be fun - especially when your teachers are toys! Meet Teddy, Doll and Horse and learn about colors and shapes. Your children will match shapes, do puzzles and color drawings. Teddy will reward them with a star each time they do well. Let's play and learn! Kids Shapes and Colors features six activities that gradually get more challenging so that the child could learn shapes and colors step by step. Match Shapes Match geometric shapes with Teddy’s drawings to learn colors and names of different shapes. Catch Shapes Catch the flying geometric shapes and match them with their drawings. Coloring Select the correct crayon and color the picture. Toy Puzzles Drag toy parts onto the shape of the toy and put the toys back together. Match Colors Sort out pencils and crayons by putting them in correct places – drawers or pencil cases of the same color and learn the the color and name of the object. Toy Shelf Put the missing parts onto the correct toys by matching shapes and colors.

description: Survival Puzzle Game, try to fight your way through Conways Game of Life! The Game of Life, also known simply as Life, is a cellular automaton devised by the British mathematician John Horton Conway in 1970.( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conway's_Game_of_Life ) One interacts with the Game by creating an initial configuration and observing how it evolves. Player Affect the evolution by Adding and removing cell through Touching the Screen. Eval Green Cancer to consume your Cells, fight off with your ever evolving Cell count.

description: Browse reddit using a fast, slick, and feature packed interface. Includes convenient features: ● Optimized Tablet Layouts with multiple panes. ● List Mode with fast scrolling and swiping right to left to show more options (voting, comments, sharing). ● Expanded Mode to show all your favorite content with horizontal scrolling per subreddit. ● Gallery Mode to easily scroll through images and posts. ● Login functionality to allow for personalization. ● Ability to view your Inbox and filter by folder. ● Subreddit Manager which allows you to subscribe and unsubscribe from reddits while allowing you to find new reddits based on what is new or popular. ● Subreddit Manager search mode allows you to find a subreddit easily! ● Side Menu to allow for quick switching between your favorite subreddits! ● Voting bar to show upvotes and downvotes. Great visualization! ● Built-in Subreddit Filtering with Quick UnSubscribe. ● SFW/Mixed/NSFW modes to suit your needs. ● Sorting by category (Hot, Controversial, Top, etc) ● Comments View with voting bar per comment and fast scrolling with swiping for voting and sharing. ● Ability to reply to comments and posts when logged in. ● Filter comments to show only OP (original poster) comments! ● Sort comments by Best, Hot, New, Top, Controversial and Old depending on your preference. ● Built in browser to load reddit posts with progress bar. ● Save images directly from the browser and open/etc. ● Capture screenshots of entire browser area or just the view that you see. Screenshot can be saved/opened/shared/etc. ● Automatically saves list of visited posts. ● Multi-Core supported for faster loading! (Android 3.0+ only) ● Built in support for Holo Dark theme. *More features on the way. Feedback welcomed and appreciated!

description: Spirit, by Marco Mazzoli. The critically acclaimed iPhone hit now on Android! Specially for the Android version: both Spirit and Spirit HD (tablet version) included in the same package. Buy once and play both versions of the game on your different devices. Simple and fun to play. No shooting. No on-screen controls. Just slide your finger and Spirit will mimic your movements. Check out what people are saying about it: • "Spirit is a paradigm example of independent game development for the iPhone" - 'Must Have', No DPad • "If you're looking for a challenging new arcade experience, this one's easy to recommend" - Touch Arcade • "Spirit is a budget gem you don’t want to miss" - TouchGen • "One of the best arcade-style apps on the App Store right now" - GameZebo • "The experience is incredibly fluid and seamless. It just feels right, and no amount of screen-shots can do it justice" - themacfeed.com • "Hypnotic, compelling stuff" - The Sunday Times • "Slick control scheme meets fantastic visual effects and sound design; this is the complete arcade package" - Games Uncovered Take control of Spirit in an intense retro inspired arcade experience, reinvented for Android devices. Guide Spirit against many different enemy types, and distort space to force them into another dimension. Features a fluid, easy to play yet hard to master control system. Relative movement allows you to keep your finger out of the way of the action. Combine links and combos to build up huge scores. Fight your way through increasingly challenging waves, uniquely generated for each game. App2SD supported. Please email any questions. If you have already purchased the HD version and would like to upgrade to the XHD, please purchase the XHD version and email us your Google Wallet order number for both your HD and XHD purchases and we'll refund the HD purchase. TROUBLESHOOTING: Below are solutions to common problems but feel free to email us if you are still having any problems and we'll get back to you. * If having purchased the game you get a license failure, this is because the purchase may take some time to be recorded on the Google license server. It will resolve within a few hours or you can try restarting your device and reinstalling. * If you get "Not compatible with your device" from the Market App, please try clearing your Market App Cache (Settings, Applications, Market, Clear Cache) and restarting your device. * If your download is declined, your credit card authorisation will have failed. Please update your card details (usually the address doesn't match) and retry the purchase. * The game uses Google's standard licensing service. It will use the internet to retrieve a license which will expire periodically and then be automatically renewed. The longer you have the game, the longer the time between license renewals. If you have any other problems or other feedback, please don't hesitate to drop us an email and we'll get back to you. Small Print: VAT added within EU. May require license from Google & collect anonymous stats.

description: Are you tired of typing in Chinese by taping keys? Do you want to learn Chinese by writing them in real life? Simply handwrite Chinese each character (both traditional or simplified) and it will recognize it for you in less than one second. Its recognition rate and accuracy is almost prefect. Users review: "I want to learn Chinese, so I begin with this by hand writing not typing. This is the best way" "It just saves my time while typing in Chinese" Features of Handwriting Functions: * Make input Chinese characters easy by enabling hand writing mode on the writing board * The handwriting now only supports traditional and simplified Chinese * Hand writing function automatically identifies both simplified Chinese and traditional Chinese * High and fast recognition rate. HOW TO USE 1. It uses GO Keyboard, you should have GO Keyboard installed to use it; Click here to redirect to the app which has 10000+ colorful themes available and 800+ emoji free to use. 2. After downloading the GO Keyboard and this plugin, please click open the GO Keyboard icon to access the setting page -> Languages -> Check the box “中文（笔画）” (which means “Chinese(Handwriting)”) 3. Launch the keyboard to type -> long press on one of the two shortcuts next to language setting button in toolbar right above keyboard -> Select the pencil icon -> Click on the pencil shortcut again to bring up the writing board Make sure you follow all the steps to access this feature. Give us a five star if you like us. If you have problems, recommendations, please email us or report on our Facebook page. We will deal with it together. Email:goforkeyboard@gmail.com Follow us on Facebook: http://goo.gl/kLxbSl Use of this app is governed by our Terms of Service: http://www.goforandroid.com/en/term-of-service.html Privacy Policy: http://www.goforandroid.com/en/privacy-policy.html

description: Control Spotify on your Windows computer with Timote! (no MAC support) Timote turns your phone in a remote control for Spotify. With it, you can control Spotify from anywhere in the house. It's ideal for parties, lazy days or if you have a media center tucked away in a closet. Timote will NOT play any audio! (It REQUIRES the installation of the Timote server on your PC. Get it for free from http://www.nodria.com ) Features: - Control what's playing now: play/pause, next/previous track, Spotify/PC sound volume, shuffle, repeat, track pos - Search for tracks, artists, albums - Access your playlists, selection, personal music... - Control the play queue - Launch track/artist radio - Star/Unstar tracks - Access your tracks history - Add tracks to playlists (Spotify premium users) - Manage your favorites (tracks, albums, artists, playlists...) - Widget - Lockscreen controls - Auto pause on incoming/outgoing calls If you have any trouble using Timote, please send me an e-mail or leave a message on the forum ( http://www.nodria.com/forum ). Timote communicates with the Timote server component over Wifi. Make sure your phone and your computer are connected on the same wifi network to establish the connection. After the installation of the Timote server component, when you launch it for the first time, you may be prompted by the Windows Firewall. You have to authorize the server component to access the network or it won't be able to communicate with your phone/tablet. About the permissions, the "READ PHONE STATUS AND IDENTITY" permission is required to let Timote automatically pause the music when an incoming call is received on the phone. This product uses a SPOTIFY API but is not endorsed, certified or otherwise approved in any way by Spotify. Spotify is the registered trade mark of the Spotify Group.

description: ! Attention: If the game crashes as soon as you try to play, please go to the options menu and press the update the questions button (you need internet for it to work). ! Welcome to Hogwarts! Test your knowledge of Rowlings world with this unofficial "Harry Potter" quiz app of over 500 questions about the books and movies of "Harry Potter" (Part 1 to 7(8) and more)! This app is for all fans of "Harry Potter" and Harry Potters epic world! Can you manage to answer all the questions? Answer more than 500 questions on 12 different levels of difficulty. If you ever need assistance, you can rely on the three jokers. Collect achievements during the game and choose for which of the 4 houses of Hogwarts you want to play. Answer the questions correctly and rise in your power and in your level. Work your way from a simple student up to one of the most powerful wizards of all time! Test your skills in Challenge mode and play against time or for lives. Compare your high scores with the world and tell your friends. Features: - Over 500 questions about Harry Potter - Advance levels and make your way from a simple student up to a powerrful wizard - Play for each house of Hogwarts - Earn Achievements - Play in the Challenge mode and reach the high score - Cloudsave - Suggest questions and see them implemented in the quiz If you want to help the development of the app please rate the app, give feedback and join our beta test group at: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/102588539040686608767 Have fun!
release_text: If you have any trouble with the app, feel free to contact me via EMail and I will try to fix any problems! 2.2.1 - 2.2.4 -Bug Fixes -Minor changes 2.2 -Huge overhaul of the questions: You get, can suggest and report questions directly to our new server and database so youll get always new questions! -Animations!! -Removed the ads on the time challenge mode (fullscreen in between questions) -minor tweaks

description: Animated Cyanogen theme to be used with GO Launcher EX Locker Theme. A perfect match for the GO LAUNCHER EX Cyanogen theme available in my other apps. .-=[ MATCHING THEMES AVAILABLE FOR ]=-. - GO Launcher EX - GO SMS Pro - GO Contacts EX - exDialer - Skinnable Calculator You can find the matching themes in my other APPs in Android Market. .-===[ REQUIREMENTS ]===-. Needs latest version of GO Launcher EX and GO Locker installed to apply the theme. These APPs are free and available throught Android Market. Do NOT OPEN the theme it´s to be used with GO LAUNCHER EX and GO LOCKER apps together, see instructions bellow to applying the theme. .-===[ APP2SD CARD ]===-. Yes. Must have Android OS 2.2 (Froyo) or Up. .-=[ APPLYING THE THEME ]=-. 1) In GO Launcher EX press the phone menu button; 2) Select PREFERENCES option; 3) Select VISUAL SETTINGS option; 4) Select GO LOCKER option; 5) Tick GO LOCKER ENABLE; 6) Select MY LOCKER option; 7) From the Theme listing select the theme you´ve just download and installed; 4) Select APPLY; .-=[ MORE FROM DEVELOPER ]=-. Click on my Name profile to view all my Android APPs available. .-=[ CUSTOMMER SUPPORT ]=-. If you need any help with this APP or wish to contact me, send me an email. I try to reply emails daily, if not possible I´ll reply in no more than 48hs. I do not reply emails in weekends, emails are replied from Monday - Friday. .-=[ ABOUT REFUNDS ]=-. Refunds are available for 15 minutes, if you wish to cancel the order do it during this time. If this is a free theme or APP you can cancel and try again several times. If it´s a paid application and you cancel it, the second time you order it no refund will be available. .-=[ DOWNLOADS ARE NOT COMPLETING? ]=-. Please, sometimes the Android Market servers becomes really slow with so many requests, if this happen you can try another time. I have no control over this issue. Some patience is required when it happens. .-=[ COMMENTS AND RATINGS ]=-. To help other customers, your comments and ratings are welcome and I apreciate it. Also, if you need any assistance, please contact me first before posting offensive comments. It´s better to have a help from a developer than avoid him and leaving negative public feedbacks. .-=[ UPDATES ]=-. All my themes are updated on a regular base to improve the theme with new features like more icons, wallpapers, etc. Requests for new icons are welcome.

description: Designed for anybody owning one or more vehicles (cars, motorcycles, etc.), the Car Manager application allows you to store everything related to them: administrative information, insurance, fuel or maintenance expenses, mileage of the next maintenance, date of the next technical inspection, as well as the information related to your favourite service providers (garages, assistance, specialized stores, etc.) ★★★ "Great for anyone who owns more than one car, Car Manager lets you store lots of information on your vehicles to help keep them in great shape." - appolicious.com ★★★ "Keep tabs on your vehicles with Car Manager's useful, informational records notation fields which allow you to maintain your car without forgetting one detail !" - cooliphoneipadapps.com For each vehicle, input your fill-ups in a matter of seconds, to obtain an updated view of your expenditure, mileage and consumption. The application updates the overview and detailed statistics of your expenses: cost per spending category, cost per kilometer or daily cost. Non financial data, such as the change in mileage and average fuel consumption can also be calculated, and displayed in brief or in detail. A carbon footprint can also be calculated, depending on the consumption of the vehicle, as well as the mass of carbon dioxide (CO2) it produces (total and average per day and per mile traveled). Car Manager also allows all these data (costs, fill-ups, vehicle information) to be exported and sent by e-mail directly from your device as a CSV file (comma separated values, which can opened and processed by Excel or any other spreadsheet program), should you feel the need to create your own personalized statistics. The application also enables you to manage a directory containing all the information about the service providers for your vehicles: insurance companies, garages, stores, clubs, associations, etc. You can then easily locate them thanks to the Maps interface. Car Manager also provides you with a Tools section, which allows you to geolocate your current position or your parking spot in a single click, so you can easily go back there later with the integrated GPS visual guiding function (or with Maps directions). This tools section can also help you find various services around your location: gas stations, garages, restaurants, hotels and others. The application automatically adapts itself to the units of measurement effective in your country: kilometers or miles for distances, liters or gallons for fuel. ★ Freemium version, limited to 2 cars and 5 fillups by vehicle. Integrated purchase (IAB) unlocks unlimited creation ★ App for Android 2.2 and above, optimized for smartphones and tablets.
release_text: V1.06 : Remove of the cost value when adding a cost. V1.07 : Improved battery usage for some devices (new authorization required to manage notifications). Improved search bar. V1.08 : Fixed a crash issue when exporting a file on SD Card on Android 4.4 V1.09 : Upgrade in app billing to V3 V1.11 : Fixed a bug on Annual Costs Screen

description: Designed for anybody owning one or more vehicles (cars, motorcycles, etc.), Gas Manager allows you to create a detailed dashboard with your fuel consumption, your gas expenses and the miles you have traveled. For each vehicle, input your fill-ups in a matter of seconds, and keep track of the evolution of several parameters in different ways (overview, graphs or lists): - gas consumption - gas price - mileage per month - cost of gas per mile/kilometer - mileage per gallon/liter - mileage per euro/dollar/etc. A carbon footprint can also be calculated, depending on the vehicle’s consumption. You will thus be able to assess the total mass of carbon dioxide (CO2) it produces, as well as the average value per day and per kilometer traveled. Gas Manager also allows all these data to be exported and sent by e-mail directly from your device as a CSV file (comma separated values, which can be opened and processed by Excel or any other spreadsheet program), should you feel the need to create your own personalized statistics. You are able to input your fill-up history either manually or by importing a CSV file. Gas Manager also provides you with a Tools section, which enables you to geolocate your current position or your parking spot in a single click, so you can easily go back there later using a GPS guiding function or Google Maps. This tools section can also help you find various services around your location: gas stations, garages, restaurants, hotels and others. The application automatically adapts itself to the units of measurement effective in your country: miles or kilometers for distances, and gallons, liters or KWh (electric vehicles) for fuel. ★ Freemium version, limited to 10 fill-ups by vehicle. Integrated purchase (IAB) unlocks unlimited fill-up creation ★ App for Android 2.2 and above, optimized for smartphones and tablets.
release_text: V1.35 : Fixed a potential issue related to the GPS usage Fixed a potential crash issue related to the CSV File Import Fixed a potential crash issue when using the graphs V1.36 : Improved search bar. V1.37 : Fixed a graphical bug on recent devices related to fill-up list screen. V1.38 : Fixed a crash issue when exporting a file on SD Card on Android 4.4 V1.39 : Fixed a bug in analysis by month list screen. V1.40 : Upgrade In App Billing to V3.

description: Chuck Yourself! Meet Chuck, a spunky little blob with an ENORMOUS appetite! Keep him happy and watch him grow by collecting crystals in this physics-based adventure game. Use your finger to stretch and pull gooey globs of muck, creating bridges, shooting ooze cannons and flinging your high-flying critter. Navigate through treacherous environments avoiding exploding volcanoes and sneaky Welk guards as you pick up special bonus gear to advance your quest and reveal hidden challenges. The crystal buffet is open and it’s all you can eat, so get ready to Chuck the Muck! ---Key Features--- - simple, high-flying trajectory controls - interactive “Muck Physics” - 40 challenging levels - 4 unique environments - hidden content and bonus levels - earn achievements and collect rewards For more information or support, please visit www.planetmuck.com Minimum 512MB RAM required for smoother gameplay.

description: Bring the Mayhem. Fight for Might! BATTLE! your friends and foes in live PvP battles QUEST! for glory with single-player missions and epic boss fights LOOT! enemies for gold and lost treasure CREATE! an army of heroes from across the realm EXPLORE! the Lost Kingdom in stunning 3D environments EVOLVE! your troops from scrappy fighters to elite warriors CUSTOMIZE! fighters by equipping battle-changing items DISCOVER! new strategies with different fighter combinations King Dragon's flames burned away the old realm, and his monsters rule the ashes. But an ember of hope still flickers, waiting for the right hero to rekindle it: You! Get ready for Might & Mayhem, an arcade-style battle strategy game with live PvP battles and epic single-player quests! Assemble your team of knights, bandits, wizards, goblins, robots and monsters and strike out for adventure! Create new strategies with different fighter combinations and customize your troops with battle-changing items to destroy the competition and loot them for treasure! Conquer the Lost Kingdom and defeat King Dragon to save the realm and become a Legendary Hero! Glory is YOURS for the taking! This game may include: - Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13. - Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page. - The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
release_text: Welcome to Might & Mayhem! Here’s what’s new in v1.34: New Main Menu & Map Rooms! - We have updated the game’s main menu to improve accessibility throughout the game. - The world and zone maps are now presented in a 3D map room. Sales have arrived! - Lots of new discount offers on a variety of products. Log in often so you never miss a sale! Tons of ability changes-- too many to list! The full patch notes can always be found here: http://kizstudios.com/mightandmayhem/updates

description: Capture all incoming texts directly to Evernote. Evernote is by far the best GTD system due to it's flexibility. With this application, get your incoming texts into Evernote for action or for archival. Once installed, enter your Evernote account email address and all your incoming text messages will be forwarded. Optionally, you can specify an existing notebook and up to 3 tags. Set and forget. By using your Evernote email, we never have access to your account. Safe and secure. -------- Where is my Evernote Email Address? -Android app - Go to settings, tap your username and your evernote email address will be displayed. -Web - Click on your login name in the upper-right. Choose settings and your email address will be displayed under "Email notes to" ------- Due to a restriction within Evernote, you cannot choose a notebook or tag that contains spaces.

description: A simple chess board and a chess clock without movement restrictions. Free movement as a real board. Starting positions for chess and checkers are available. • Use a chess clock where you can configure initial time, move time increment, increment after a number of movement, hourglass time, ... • Set time independent for black and white if required. • Save/load time settings for later use. Already available some common times.

description: MoreQuicklyPanel is a customizable toggle widget at a notification panel. More toggle buttons at a limited notification area by multi-paged feature. A page switching animation is cool. A status bar icon shows more toggle statuses in addition to a battery level. Low battery consumption as a notification widget! In v.3.1, added the brightness slider as a popup! Additional popups are coming soon. Android 4.4 KitKat is supported! Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich or later, MoreQuicklyPanel performs full function. Of course, supports Android 4.1, 4.2, 4.3 Jelly Bean and Android 3.1, 3.2 Honeycomb also. Android 2.3 and 3.0 are supported, even there are some limited functions. * Android 5.0 Lolipop is now testing. Please see latest information at http://goo.gl/vkeC5 . The best partner of GALAXY Nexus, Nexus 7, Nexus 4, Nexus 5, Nexus 10 and Nexus 6, HTC One series and Xperia series!! * If blank panel is shown, please reduce 'Items per page'. * If you like the previous layout and icons, please check [Classic layout]. Features: - More Quickly access to any toggle from a notification panel. - More toggles are placed at the panel by the multi-page feature. The page switching animation is comfortable. - You can open settings of Wi-Fi or Bluetooth etc. by sub button below main toggle buttons. - New Popup Panel feature is available at some sub buttons.(Brightness slider NEW!) - You can customize toggle items to show and its order. - You can select toggle icon color. - You can customize a color of background and separator. - Starts MoreQuicklyPanel automatically at boot time. - The icons are blinking while the status are changing. (Wifi and Bluetooth) - The status bar icon shows toggle status in addition to battery level. - The status bar icon can be hidden. (Only in Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich) - Collaborate with MoreQuicklyDock. 19 toggle buttons - Airplane mode : Shows & toggles airplane mode. In 4.2 after, opens wireless & network settings. - Silent mode : Shows & toggles silent mode. Normal -> Vibrate -> Silent and Normal again. - Wi-Fi : Shows & toggles Wi-Fi. - Bluetooth : Shows & toggles Bluetooth. - GPS : Shows GPS status and opens GPS settings.(Normal apps cannot change GPS status by the system security.) - Auto-rotate screen : Shows & toggles automatic screen rotation. You can lock in the current orientation. - Accounts & sync (Auto-sync) : Shows & toggles accounts & sync (auto-sync). - Brightness : Shows & toggles brightness. Auto -> Dim -> Normal -> Max and Auto again. - Wireless & network settings : Opens 'Wireless & network settings' screen. You can toggle NFC etc. from there. - Mobile network settings : Opens 'Mobile network settings' screen. You can toggle 2G/3G/4G and 'Mobile data (Data enabled)' from there. - WiFi hotspot : Shows & toggles portable WiFi hotspot. - Mobile data : On / Off mobile data = data access over Mobile network. Equivalent to [Settings] > [Data usage] > [Mobile data] and [Settings] > [More...] > [Mobile networks] > [Data enabled] . - Flashlight : On / Off LED flashlight. You can select external flashlight apps instead of an internal feature. - Wake lock : Keeps screen ON with current brightness. - Battery : Shows battery level and opens battery status screen. - System settings : Opens system settings. - Quick settings : Opens quick settings. (Runs only Android 4.2) - MoreQuicklyPanel settings : Opens MoreQuicklyPanel settings. - Close notification panel : Closes a notification panel. The limitation on Android 2.3 and 3.0. - The notification panel always closes after touch. Please use the option 'Re-expand the panel'. (2.3 only) - An animation of page switching is not supported. (2.3 and 3.0) - Classic layout is not supported. (2.3 only) - To stay at the top, please hide a status bar icon or place it at the right end. (2.3 only) *This Wi-Fi widget only enables or disables Wi-Fi. It dose not care to connect the Wi-Fi access point.

Install this app, and if it is examined in the fly, the plants which had been weathered without knowing the name until now also remember the name and characteristics naturally. Plant Encyclopedia can carry anywhere if this app even if you can not carry it around every day, not luggage. It does not compress the storage area of ​​the body for which the image of the icon other than is stored in the SD card. This app has been certified as safe by the official app andro Idah. https://androider.jp/official/app/0f0dc6342918ef5e/

description: Once upon a Time in a Rainbow Forest far, far away from here a lot of colorful birds lived. They were happy, nice and friendly. And they got a quite unique competition, called whoooosh. Originally the word meant “the end of the day, when the young birds are going home before sunset”. It's quite simple - about half an hour before sunset all young birds must go home to their houses, that is a family tradition in the forest, in the bird world. Of course all birds must go home to their respective houses: the yellow ones to the yellow house etc. In the latest generations whoooosh changed a lot from a simple „going home” to a real challenge. It's a competition between the young birds, they even use leaderboards and so on. The whoooosh is very popular for that, all the birdies are waiting the end of the day to go and rally home in an organized manner to the best of the fun. The rules are simple - birds joining the game are waiting in line the competition begins. The start to fly home, but the challenge is simple - the color of the houses changes! So they need to fly but wait until they gate your own color. It's really a simple game, but birds not matching color end the game and then all the whoooosh ends in disaster. Further they go, better the result in this competition - the higher position on the leaderboard makes this birds happy to play this really simple, but very popular free game in the forest, Some parents want to stop this popular competition, want to end the challenge to destroy the leaderboards. They say, that going home before sunset must be not a game, must be a simple thing - just flight home and don't compete. But the youngsters love all free competitions, and that makes this game very-very popular. It's not just a good way to kill the time navigating home, but the best way to challenge other birdies - and challenge is very important in the forest! Only leaderboards are most important! So angry parents in one side, youngsters with flappy wings doing whoooosh in the other side. Who are right? May these birds of the Rainbow Forest must have a competition, like this? Maybe it will be best to stop all? NO! You must experience freely how the whoooosh is working. You must have an opinion, you must demonstrate the birdies, that this competition, this best challenge is simple, unique, and it's worth to get into the leaderboard. And it's simply one of the best games available in the Rainbow Forest. . Whoooosh!!!! is a new, action packed mindgame for all you birdie lovers around. Simple, free and unique game of fun, concentration, action and thinking. Are you ready to play it? Features: - gameplay is very easy to learn and hard to master - unique es cute cartoon-style graphics - compete with your friends or with the whole world! - fun for the whole family - Unique logical action game - Rainbow Forest - a setting directly from fairy tales Alternate Titles: Whosh, Whoosh, Whooosh, Whoooosh, Wosh, Woosh, Wooosh, Woooosh, Wooooosh

description: Spot the differences game. This is a game for the whole family. Spot the differences is a great puzzle game to test your observation . Compare 2 images and find ,search and discover 5 differences between the photo pair. That is the goal. Try the most loved game on Android. Improve your observation skills; exercise your brain while playing this deluxe game. Game features: ★ Lot's of Photo pairs ★ Hint system ★ High Score board ★ Share on social networks ★ Save to SD on Froyo + ★ Free game How to Play You are provided with 2 pictures pair. The picture pair will appear to be much similar to each other but they aren’t they are hidden. You gotta exercise your search and observation and spot the difference between the pair .Just tap on the point where you observe the difference. If you tap at the wrong position then your time would be reduced. To set high scores, finish the levels faster. If you are stuck then use a maximum of 3 hints by pressing the magnifier. Score more and win big on the board game which is rated high. Detect and Search. Score more than your friends and share the winning. Also remember to check out our other find the difference games, puzzles & reader apps. Follow us on Facebook, Twitter or Google+ and please keep emailing us with any questions or feedback! Copyright © MadRabbit Studio 2013

description: 리얼당구는 어플 이름처럼 실제 당구와 거의(99%) 흡사하게 만들었습니다. 소대/중대/대대 당구대를 모두 지원하며 당구대와 당구공의 비율도 실제 크기 비율을 그대로 축소 적용 하였으며 스핀 또한 실제 당구와 거의 근접하게 구현한 물리 엔진을 사용 하였습니다. 예를 들어 흔히 사용하는 당구용어로 '쪼댕이(?)', '슈퍼시네루', '니꾸' 같은 현상 및 마세이, 밀어치기 스트로크, 끊어치기 스트로크까지 모두 구현되어 있습니다. 게임 모드는 연습모드, 미션모드, 대전모드, 클럽모드 4가지이며 각각 다음과 같습니다. 1. 연습모드 - 3구/4구/6구를 무제한으로 마음껏 연습하실 수 있습니다. - 공의 위치를 유저 임의로 변경할 수 있고 '다시치기'와 '리플레이 보기' 기능으로 집중 연습을 할 수 있습니다. - 대전 중 관심있는 포지션을 저장하고 연습모드에서 불러와 마음껏 연습하실 수 있습니다. - 샷을 하기 전에 내 샷의 경로를 미리 볼 수 있는 '미리보기 가이드라인'을 제공 합니다. Features: - Get status of any events, update whit new Megaserver system - Check wvw stats with borderlands and eternal battleground maps - Show last Guild Wars 2 website news - Get events information from Guild Wars 2 Wiki (GW2) - Show all dyes available to customize your character © 2012 ArenaNet, Inc. description: Fun and enjoyable games and jigsaw puzzles for your kid and/or toddler will enjoy playing the game in a safe environment. The game includes many animals and levels to play and progress through. Animals include dog , cat , fish , dolphin , sheep , bear , cow , monkey , elephant and owl. The game has many features including: - 15 puzzles ranging across three puzzle types - your kids will not be board with one type - The level of difficulty goes up as the levels are completed, good for kids to advance slowly - Nice background and interactive sounds for actions - Slider control option for parents to stop kids from exiting the level by mistake - High Quality HD graphics - Finally, fun to learn and play! Let us know if you have any suggestions or feedback, we would love to hear from you to keep making better and more fun games for all our kids!

Teach your kids how to coordinate their hand and eye by solving the puzzles and placing the pieces in the right place. Game Features: - 22 puzzles ranging across three puzzle types - your kids will not be board with one type - The level of difficulty goes up as the levels are completed, good for kids to advance slowly - Nice background and interactive sounds for actions - Fun balloons to pop at the end of each successful level - Slider control option for parents to stop kids from exiting the level by mistake - High Quality HD graphics - Finally, fun to learn and play! 15 Animals presented in the games including : - Dolphin - Shark - Whale - Sea star - Crab - Sea horse - Octopus - Jellyfish - Tropical fish - Sea Tortoise - Squid - Stingray - Golden fish - Eel - Seal Feel free to contact us for questions or comments!

description: Toilets In Paris is an application that show all positions of public toilets Sanisette in Paris. Yan can make a search around your position or a search by address. Moreover, the application can work without Internet connection. The Sanisette contains a toilet hidden behind a door that opens when a button is pressed. A washbasin is provided as well. When a user enters the toilet, the door closes to provide privacy. After the user has finished using the toilet, he exits and the door closes again. A wash cycle then begins inside the toilet, and the toilet fixture itself is scrubbed and disinfected automatically. After about sixty seconds, the toilet is again ready for use. Since 2006, the access is free. Data come from ParisData under licence ODbL (Open Database Licence). Magetys is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or endorsed by JCDecaux.

description: Exercice your Memory with the latest game from Magma Mobile: Match Up Buddy. MatchUp Buddy is a card game designed for two people, although single player modes are available. Cards are laid out in a grid face down, and players take turns flipping pairs of cards over. If the two cards match, the player scores one point, the two cards are removed from the game, and the player gets another turn. If they do not match, the cards are turned back over. The object is to match pairs of cards in as little moves as possible. When cards are turned over, it is important to remember where they are for when the matching card is turned up later in the game. Match Up Buddy will allow you to challenge your memory. MatchUp Buddy has very easy 2x2, 4x4 by tables which your kids will love but also 5x6, 6x6, 8x8 and 10x10 tables which can be very challenging. Your brain's memory will be challenged on various levels as we have incorporated various images from different themes. Some of the themes are harder than others as the disctintions can be very specific. Are you ready to challenge your memory daily with MatchUp Buddy? Exercice Your Memory with your buddies ! MatchUp Buddy is a good Memory trainer for all the family!

description: Business Card Reader – this is the easiest way to save your business cards into SugarCRM. Snap a photo of business card and it will import all card data directly to your SugarCRM system. Moreover, this innovative solution allows to create a rich set of additional information about your potential client, partner, or colleague. Just two taps and you get a bird’s-eye view of the following information*: - personal info: interests, skills, social media contact, photos etc. - company info: size, industry, branch network, recent activity, etc HOW IT WORKS 1. Snap a photo of a business card 2. App recognizes it automatically 3. Get more data about person and company* 4. A new contact is automatically stored into your CRM account FEATURES - Build-in Business Card Reader to SugarCRM integration - All the necessary information in one place – just a moment to snap а business card and transfer it to your CRM account - Processes up to 20 business cards per minute - Preview and make necessary changes before saving - Save a copy of your business card data into phone contacts - Works via your Android smartphone’s camera - Recognition in 25 languages supported, including multilingual cards - Precise conversion of business card data - “Get more data” feature* uses only trusted sources - It does not violate any laws or the right of privacy - It always keeps your contacts secure SUPPORTED LANGUAGES Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch (Netherlands), English, Estonian, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian (both Bokmal and Nynorsk), Polish, Portuguese(Portugal), Portuguese (Brazilian), Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Ukrainian. PRICING FREE - for first 100 installs. Includes limited amount of business cards recognition. Pay As You Go plans: $10 – 100 business cards recognition $18 – 200 business cards recognition $35 – 500 business cards recognition Bulk pricing is available on request - please contact via email below. GET IN TOUCH Web: http://magneticonemobile.com/products/business-card-reader-sugarcrm.html E-mail: contact@magneticonemobile.com

description: Parrot Announcer will replace you usual boring ringtones with its cute voice announcing caller name and caller number with its cute Call Talker voice. Call Talker is created with custom voice rather than boring Text to Speech voices. Call Talker has its own Parrot voice to replace you boring call tones. Parrot Call Announcer is the best replacement of Caller Ringtone. When the call comes in if a known contact is calling Parrot will announce call like "Call from XYZ", if the call is from an unknown contact Parrot will do call announcement saying "Call from 1234567890". Best Caller replacement for Bird lovers with a Talking Parrot. The Talking Parrot voice is very sweet and suitable to replace Call voices.
release_text: 1. Improved Tutorial on how Parrot Call works. 2. Added support for Mute. If call is already muted, Parrot Call will not announce the call. 3. Better support for restricted numbers.

description: Mitt Schema är den smartaste appen för att visa dina skolscheman; den underlättar åtkomsten till Nova Softwares WebViewer. Facebooksida: https://www.facebook.com/MittSchema Google+ community: https://plus.google.com/communities/101199379030001938893 OBS! Appen kan bara visa dina skolscheman ifall din skola publicerar sina scheman med hjälp av Nova Software vilket de flesta skolor gör. En stor fördel med Mitt Schema är att den inte behöver en nätuppkoppling för att visa dina scheman. Man kan ladda ner dem när man har tillgång till en Wi-Fi nätverk och få dem sparade i mobilen om man nu inte vill att det ska kosta någonting. Man behöver inte längre oroa sig för att skolan inte ska vara med i den listan som finns över skolorna. Mitt Schema ger möjligheten att lätt och smidigt lägga till sin egen skola i listan. Man får även chansen att skicka skolans namn till mig så att jag lägger till det i appens nästa version. Då behöver man alltså inte vänta tills appens nästa version släpps. Appen behöver ditt personnummer för att visa dina personliga scheman ifall din skola ger ut sådana. Appen låter dig då lägga lösenord på Inställningar-sidan, så att ingen annan kommer åt dina personuppgifter. Appen kan även påminna dig när det är dags att ladda ner schemana på nytt för att inte missa någonting. Tiden kan du bestämma själv. My Schedule is the smartest app to show your school schedules; facilitating access to Nova Software WebViewer. Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/MittSchema Google+ community: https://plus.google.com/communities/101199379030001938893 NOTE The app can only show your school schedules if your school publishes their schedules by Nova Software which most schools do. A major advantage of My Schedule is that it does not need an internet connection to view your schedules. You can download them when you have access to a Wi-Fi network and have them stored in the cell phone if one does not want it to cost anything. You no longer need to worry that the school should not be included in the list that are over the schools. My Schedule provides the ability to easily and seamlessly add his own school in the list. You also get the chance to send the school's name to me so I add it to the app's next version. When one does not have to wait until the app's next version is released. The app will need your social security number to show your personal schedules if your school gives out such. The app allows you to then add password in the Settings page, so no one else can access your personal data. The app can even remind you when it's time to download the schemas again to not miss anything. Meanwhile, you can decide for yourself.
release_text: KRASH FIXATS! v1.7 - ny algoritm för automatisk bestämning av schemats storlek - 44 nya skolor har lagts till (totalt 435) v1.6 - en ny funktion för att undvika "Ogiltigt ID, period eller vecka" (ett alternativ för de som fick den gula sidan istället för sina höst- och vårterminsscheman) - 16 nya skolor har lagts till (totalt 390+) v1.5.3 - Google+ Community - fler än 230 nya skolor har lagts till (totalt 370+) - möjligheten att lägga till sitt schemas lösenord(för de scheman som kräver det)

description: A simple yet elegant World Time application with around 600+ cities to add. One screen application. Add and delete from the same screen. * Search for a city or country * Long Press on a row to Delete * Ad support Ad-Free version (with home widget) https://market.android.com/details?id=com.mahesh.worldtimeplus
release_text: Updated with Daylight Savings time.

description: The mail.com app gives you the best experience for your mail.com account and all your other accounts (e.g. hotmail, yahoo or googlemail). Enjoy features like pinch to zoom for html mails and get the best overview in our unique fullscreen mode. Set a customized quiet time for when you don’t want to be notified by incoming messages. It is simple, fast and secure using advanced encryption technologies (TLS, SSL). Send and receive mails via IMAP, POP and SMTP from all of your mail accounts. You can simply attach a photo or several pictures to any mail. mail.com is the best fully functional multi mailer app for android. Your mail.com team
release_text: 3.5: - Improved handling of draft mails - Improved push notifications - Other fixes and improvements

description: ■ 모스트샵 어플리케이션(App)? 모스트샵 인터넷쇼핑몰을 스마트폰으로 언제 어디서든 쇼핑을 즐기실 수 있는 쇼핑몰 어플리케이션입니다. 본 어플은 인터넷 쇼핑몰과 100% 연동되어 있어 상품 주문/결제,구매내역확인,장바구니 등록 등이 가능하며, 인터넷 쇼핑몰을 그대로 이용하실 수 있습니다. 어플을 통하여 모바일 쇼핑, 이벤트, 신상품, MD추천상품 등 다양한 쇼핑정보 얻고 스마트폰 속의 모스트샵 만나보세요! 언제나 행복이 가능한 모바일 쇼핑을 제공합니다! ■ 모스트샵 어플 주요기능 - 신상품, 추천상품 소개 - 카테고리 별 상품 소개 - 이벤트 정보 및 공지 확인 - 나의 주문내역, 배송정보 확인 - 장바구니, 관심상품 저장 - 공지사항 푸쉬 알림 - 고객센터 및 전화걸기 - 회원가입은 웹사이트에서 하셔야 합니다. ■ 모스트샵 웹사이트주소 www.mostshop.co.kr ■ Shop (Clips) application (App)? description: 이제 PC메신저 뿐만 아니라, 휴대폰에서도 고객문의에 실시간으로 답변하세요! PC앞에 앉아있지 않아도 OK! 바로 바로 답변이 가능하니 고객의 불만사항도 줄어듭니다! * 기존 PC메신저와도 함께 사용 가능합니다. [몰톡운영자 앱의 특징 및 주요기능] ★ 북마크친구관리 기능 : 몰톡앱에서 내 쇼핑몰을 북마크한 사용자들을 확인할 수 있습니다. ★ 채팅기능 : 톡하듯 스마트폰에서 바로바로 답변 가능합니다. 사진첨부 및 귀여운 이모티콘첨부도 가능! ★ 쇼핑몰 정보수정가능 : PC로 접속하지 않아도 앱에서 쇼핑몰 기본정보 수정이 가능합니다. ★ 부운영자 관리 : 외부쇼핑몰(메이크샵쇼핑몰이 아닌)의 경우, 부운영자를 앱에서 추가하여 부운영자에게 아이디를 부여할 수 있습니다. ★ 알림설정 : 채팅알림 및 알림시간 설정, 알림소리를 바꿀 수 있습니다. ★ 잠금기능 : 앱 비밀번호 잠금을 통해, 정보보안을 유지할 수 있습니다. ★ 리포트기능 : 메이크샵 상점(외부상점 불가)이라면, 어제 오늘의 주문금액 및 몰톡으로 인한 SMS할인금액등을 확인할 수 있습니다. 대표 참여 쇼핑몰 : 금찌, 난닝구, 소녀감성, 09우먼, 토모나리, 무지개솜사탕, 바닐라민트, 써니, 제이드, 쿠키하우스, 콩스타일 외 2000+개 이상의 국내 유명 쇼핑몰들이 몰톡 참여중입니다. (2014년 8월 현재, 계속 추가중) [몰톡 어플문의] 웹사이트: malltalk.kr 이메일: help@malltalk.kr
release_text: 서비스 안정화

description: Try out Maluuba - it should help you organize your day, find things to do, and stay connected to what matters. With our sophisticated natural language AI platform, Maluuba for Android is the best way to see how intuitive and versatile natural interfaces can be. Some great questions to try out: "Sushi restaurants in New York" "What movies are in theaters?" "What was the score of the Man United game last week?" "How many touchdowns has Peyton Manning scored this season? "What is Amazon's stock price?" "Text Justin I'll be there soon!" FEATURES ✓ Sports? NHL, MLB, NFL, European Soccer and more ✓ Stocks and quotes! Maluuba supports the NASDAQ, NYSE and TSE markets ✓ Full interactive Dialogue support ✓ Hungry? Search for restaurants with Maluuba with questions like "Where can I get a cheeseburger?" ✓ Get directions to places you're looking for ✓ Ask for movie showtimes and watch trailers through the app ✓ Set Reminders easily! E.g. "Remind me to buy milk on Tuesday at 8pm" ✓ Create Alarms through voice like 'Wake me up tomorrow at 8am' ✓ Ask general, knowledge questions and get exact results ✓ Ask queries like 'where can I get a toothbrush?" or 'where can I practice yoga?" -- Contact us -- We love making our users happy where we can! If you have any problems or comments or suggestions for improving our app, please contact us at android_support@maluuba.com . Your feedback is important to us.
release_text: - Multiple cards can now be returned - Results now augmented with search results - Fixed issue where app may not answer if default language on your phone wasn't English - Reminders from old version of Maluuba will be restored and still alarm at the time they were set to remind you. - Some minor bug fixes

description: «ЗНО – Супергерой» – тренуйся завжди і всюди :) Мобільний додаток «ЗНО – Супергерой» дає можливість усім, хто готується до складання ЗНО, робити це мобільно, інтенсивно та по-сучасному! У додатку Ви знайдете: - велику базу тестів минулих років; - автентичну систему підрахунку результатів; - актуальну та корисну інформацію для абітурієнтів; - приємний дизайн і широкий функціонал додатка. Матеріали для тестів взяті з сайту Українського центру оцінювання якості освіти. "SET - Superhero" - trenuysya always and everywhere :) Mobile application "SET - Superhero" gives an opportunity to all who qualify to pass EIT, do it flexibly, rapidly and in a modern way! Attached you will find: - Extensive database tests of previous years; - Authentic scoring system; - Actual and useful information for students; - Nice design and broad functionality of the application. Materials for tests taken from the website of the Ukrainian Center for Educational Quality Assessment.
release_text: Незначительные улучшения

description: 공부, 빨리 끝내고 놀자! 기능 : 공부 ➤ 요약 ➤ 복습 효과 : 집중력↑ + 암기력↑ → 성적↑ 대상 : 암기에 죽고 사는 수험생 이론 : 기억주기, 초가속학습법 기능 설명서 (요약) : 1. Stop Watch (학습하기) : 공부량을 늘리는 공부 2. Smart Note : 암기 할 내용 마킹 및 요약 3. Review Alarm : 1분 복습 x 10회 = 6년 암기 (주기적 복습알람) 4. Music : 집중력을 높여 주는 바로크 음악 3분 빠른 합격을 기원합니다. p.s) 1. 공부에 필요한 기능 있으신분, 2. 좋은 성과나 소식 있으신분 저에게 메일이나 리플로 알려주시면 가문에 영광이겠습니다. *^^* ========================================= 상세 사용설명서 (학습법의 핵심 요약) "공부, 빨리 끝내고 놀자" 스터디플래너_StudyPlanner는 시간의 질을 높임으로서 합격에 필요한 시간을 줄여(공부시간 절약) 준다. 이해력, 집중력 및 암기력을 향상 시키는 실용적인 공부 앱(어플리케이션)이다. 즉, 하루 12시간을 공부하는 것 보다, 8시간에 12시간의 학습량을 끝내고 4시간의 여유를 즐기는 공부의신 들의 숨은 비법이 녹아 들어 있다. 공부 잘하는 법을 알려주는 학습 도우미 1. 학습하기(1) : [20분 학습 -> 5분 휴식-> 5분 복습(사진 촬영, 마킹)] X 회수 공부는 엉덩이로 하는 게 아니다! 공부는 얼마나 ‘오래’ 가 아니라 얼마나 ‘효율적’으로 하느냐가 중요합니다. 1회 학습시 2번(학습 시작 및 종료 시점)의 회상력(암기력) 최고점을 갖는다(초두 효과, 마감 효과). 따라서 학습 시간 단위를 짧게 나누면 회상력의 최고점의 회수를 늘릴 수 있어 암기력을 높일 수 있다. 뿐만아니라 집중력도 높아진다. 효률적인 학습 시간 단위는 학습자의 집중력에 따라 차이가 있으나 통상적인 학습시간은 20~50분, 휴식시간은 2~10분인 것으로 알려져 있다. 경험상 학습시간 20분에 휴식시간 5분 후 5분 복습(1차)이 가장 적절해 보인다. (각각의 학습자는 자신에 맞는 시간을 찾기 위한 테스트를 여러번 하여 바탕화면의 '설정'에서 설정하면 됨. 학습자마다 학습시간 및 휴식시간이 다름) 학습시간과 휴식시간 및 반복 횟수를 입력하면, '예상 학습 시간'을 계산하여 시작 시간과 종료 시간을 보여줌으로서 계획적, 체계적, 주도적으로 시간을 지배 할 수 있도록 정보를 제공 한다. '학습시작'을 클릭하면, 설정된 학습시간 및 휴식시간에 알람을 준다. 자기주도학습(자습)의 이해학습(진도)에 효과적이다. 학습 전 5분 또는 학습 중 60Hz의 바로크 음악을 들으면, 암기력과 이해력 및 집중력이 향상된다. 2. 학습하기 (2) : 실전 대비 문제풀이 스탑와치 (백 타이머 back timer, 카운트 다운 countdown, 초시계) 실전은 연습처럼. 연습은 실전처럼! 최근의 시험 경향은 빠른 시간내의 답을 찾아내는 능력을 평가하는 방향으로 변화하고 있다. 따라서 반드시 문제풀이를 할 때에는 제한 시간내에 푸는 연습을 하는 것이 필수다. 지문을 포함한 문제만 시간내에 정확히 읽어도 정답을 찾을 수 있는 (지식의 깊이보다) 빠른 독해력을 요구한다. 특히, 대학입시 수학능력평가(대입 수능)의 언어 영억(국어), 외국어 영역(영어) 및 토익, 텝스, 토플 등에서 이러한 현상이 두드러 진다. 3. 스마트 노트 : 필기 노트 or 책 사진 촬영 -> 핵심 단어 마킹 기록은 기억을 지배한다! 강의를 듣고 난 후 or '학습하기'를 실행하지 않고, 필기 한 것 또는 기억해야 할 내용을 사진 촬영으로 저장하는 기능이다. 이 기능이 중요한 이유는 학습량을 줄여서 학습 시간을 줄여주기 때문이다. 중요 기능은 마킹이다. 빨간색과 노랑색의 마커(형광팬)으로 중요도를 분류하고, 이미 암기 한 것과 앞으로 암기 할 것을 구분하여 중요 핵심 단어에 마킹하고, 복습시 마킹된 부분만을 반복해서 확인하면 공부량과 공부시간을 줄일 수 있다. 이것이 바로 시간의 효율성을 극대화하는 핵심이다. 복습시에는 반드시 확인만 한다. 내용을 억지로 암기하려고 하지 말고 복습주기마다 내용을 확인만 해 주면 암기하려 하지 않아도 암기가 된다. 그리고 전체 내용이 머리 속에서 유기적인 마인드맵 Mind Map의 구조를 만든다. 4. 복 습 : 알람이 공부할 시간에 공부할 내용을 알려준다 공부는 복습이다! 에빙하우스 망각곡선의 복습주기를 기본으로 하였으나, 당일 저녁, 3일, 15일은 경험적으로 추가되었다. 당일저녁복습은 꼭 필요해 보인다. 그러나 3일, 15일은 옵션(선택사항)이다. 각 학습자에게 어려운 과목이나 암기를 철저히 해야 하는 과목에 한하여 추가적으로 실행 하면 된다. Study Planner가 특별한 것은 고시생을 위해 3년의 복습주기로 설계 되었다는 것이다. 시간이 지날 수록 공부량이 줄어 들 것이다. '공부 할 수록, 공부량이 줄이 들지 않고, 더 많아진다'고 고민하는 수험생들에게 제격이다. 5. 음 악 : 바로크 음악으로 암기력과 집중력을 높인다 뇌를 깨우는 음악! 게오르기 로자노프 Georgi Lozanov의 초가속 암시학습법(슈퍼러닝 Super-learning, Suggestopeadia, 유네스코의 지원을 받은 바 있음)으로 암기력과 집중력을 높일수 있다. 경험상 졸음이 올 때 바로크 음악을 듣는 것이 커피를 마시는 것보다 효과적이다. 학습시간에 60Hz(비트)의 바로크 음악 특히 작곡가 '바흐'의 클래식을 들으면, 우리의 뇌를 세타파 상태로 만들어 암기를 잘 할 수 있게 한다. 휴식시간에는 학습자 각자가 좋아하는 빠른 비트의 휴식 음악을 들으며 가볍게 분위기를 전환시켜주면 좋다. '학습시간음악'의 리스트에 듣기 음원 파일을 등록하여 리스닝 연습용 어학기로도 활용 할 수 있다. 추천 학습시간음악 : 가) Corelli, Concerti Grossi, Op. 6, No. 2, 8, 5, 9. 나) Corelli, Concerti Grossi, Op. 4, No. 10, 11. 12. 다) Handel, The Water Music. 라) J.S. Bach, Fantasy in G major, Fantasy in C Minor and Trio in D minor; Canonic Variations and Toccata. 마) Vivaldi. Five Concertos for Flute and Chamber Orchestra. 6. 설 정 : 모든 초기값을 이 곳에서 세팅할 수 있다 나만의 맞춤 공부 설정하기! 학습시간, 휴식시간, 반복회수, 학습시간 음악, 휴식시간 음악. 특히, 하루중 복습시간을 정하는 '복습시작시간'과 복습 주기를 체크하는 '복습일정'은 자신만의 스타일로 설정하되, 차후 학습을 해 나가면서 자신에 맞게 조금씩 조정하여 최상의 학습 조건을 찾아으면 된다. 개발자 웹사이트 : www.StudyPlanner.kr 구글 플러스 : google.com/+Myfamilypark1 study, Let's play finished soon!   Function: Study Summary ➤ ➤ Review Effect Concentration sexual ↑ ↑ → ​​↑ + memorization Target: students live to die on memorization Theory: Remember cycles, accelerate early learning Features Guide (summary): 1. release_text: Ver 1.3 update 2014. 4. 24. 업그래이드 내용(1) 1.시간 계산 오류 수정 2014. 3. 21. 업그레이드의 주요 내용 1. 스마트 노트(사진) 삭제 기능 추가 : 메인 화면의 복습' 클릭 -> '삭제' 클릭 2. 시간 단위 변경 : 분단위 -> 초단위 (실전 문제풀이용) : 사용법 : '학습시간' -> '학습시작' -> '계속학습' (문제 수 만큼 클릭 3. '학습하기' 중 '이미지 추가' 없이 다음 단계로 '넘기기' 추가 : 학습 -> 휴식 -> 'SMART NOTE' 클릭 -> '넘기기' 클릭 4. 카운트 기능 개선 : 홈버튼이나 화면잠금 후 카운트 정지 및 지연 -> 정상 작동 5. 알림 기능 개선 : '무음' -> '깜빡임' : 조용해야 하는 곳(도서관)에서 사용하면 좋겠죠. 6. 음악 파일 : wma 재생 가능 (자신의 음원(바로크 클래식)을 선택하면 됨, 별도의 음원을 제공하지는 않음)

description: This app helps you to remind when you have to take your birth control pill. If you forget your pill sometimes, this app is for you. If you want, this app will put a notification in the notification bar to remind you that the time to take the pill has come and it will also ring an alarm for you. "Birth Control Pill Alarm" is a virtual pill pack where you mark the state of your real pill pack. It's very easy to use: -When you buy a pill pack, tap the plus button in the action bar or in the center of the screen and configure it. Enter the start date, the active days, the rest days and whether it has placebo pills for the rest days. -Now you can swipe left or right to see the pack you want. -Whenever you take the pill, tap the pill in the screen and select "take the pill". -When you finish a pack, you can delete the pack by tapping the cross button in the action bar. You can configure the alarm at any time tapping the button with a gear shape in the action bar (settings). You can make notes in any pill if you want to remember something related to that pill or that day. This app has some ads, and you can remove it upgrading it to premium. So the features are: * Notification reminder * Alarm reminder (chose any ringtone you want) * Vibrator * Repeat alarm until pill is taken * Taking Notes * Customizable number of pills * Can upgrade to "premium" to remove the ads

description: Choose your favorite combatants and face up to the successive waves of soliders and tanks. Top-notch graphics, humor and a fun game all the way through; this is the future of Tower Defense! description: The most popular city quiz finally has arrived in your country. The concept is simple, you have 4 photos and you must guess which city they are! How many will you be able to recognise? Come and test your geography skills! Only 1.5% of players have managed to finish the game! PLAY IT NOW Whether you are on a plane, at your place, or even at work you can take part in the fun and build your memory! The only rule: guess the city! Cities from all over the world! No sign-up Play offline UNLIMITED FUN Hundreds of cities available! New cities added regularly in real-time. No need to update to continue playing! A CONTINUOUS CHALLENGE Able to find all the cities? Some levels too easy? Don't worry, the next ones will be much harder :)

description: The world's most popular music quiz has finally arrived in Great Britain with content selected especially for Great Britain ! The concept is simple. It's just like 'name that tune': listen to the song extract and find the name of the song or artist! How many will you recognise? A fun and addictive version of name that tune, where you'll find thousands of players who have already won: - 'I played music quiz with friends and we had hours of fun!' - 'Wow, finally an original game of name that tune with a quality song selection' Less than 2% of players were able to finish the game! PLAY NOW Whether you're on the plane, at home or at work you can take part in the fun and test your music knowledge! - By yourself or at a party with friends, there's just one rule: guess the song! - Compare your level with players around the world! - Based on popular music in Great Britain, from The Arctic Monkeys to Rihanna, via Oasis and Eminem! - No registration UNLIMITED FUN Hundreds of songs! Music added regularly, in real time. No need to wait for an update to keep playing! CONTINUOUS CHALLENGE Can you find all the songs? Some levels seem too easy? Do not worry, the next ones will be more difficult :) Like us on Facebook to be aware about our releases. Link: http://on.fb.me/1cU04V3
release_text: Your favorite Music Quiz had a BIG MAJOR update ! NEW : Play now with the music you love! You can choose through few categories, Pop, Rock, Rap and a lots more, the pack you want to play with!

description: Brought to you by Subaru. Makes walking the dog fun and informative! Track the route, time, distance, speed, pace and calories in real-time for fitness activities using your GPS enabled mobile device. New for 2014: Map Pins show where to find dog parks, dog-friendly restaurants, water fountains, and the all-important waste bag dispensers! * If your phone supports it, you can now connect via Bluetooth 4.0 LE to a compliant Heart Rate strap. Currently, this will work for Droid RAZR users! Buy a strap in our online store: mapmyfitness.com/shop dog walk, dogwalk, walk the dog
release_text: Version 3.10.1: What's new is a fancy new What's New notice! Check it out. Fixed a bug with posting twice to Facebook and Twitter. Because that was annoying. Get ready for your close-up! Now you can edit your picture from your profile. Android Wear: if you had problems starting workouts from your watch, we fixed that. For information on required permissions, visit: http://mmf.cc/android-permissions

description: Map My Fitness – Track Workouts, Running, Cycling, Walking, and Calorie Counter Get fit with the MapMyFitness community. Log over 600 different types of workouts; record GPS-based activities to view detailed stats; log on to the web to join Challenges, connect devices and view 24/7 activity data. ALL THE FEATURES YOU NEED TO SUCCEED ☆ Gear Tracker - Add your athletic shoes and start tracking mileage with Gear Tracker. Help yourself avoid common injuries and get notified when it’s time for a new pair. ☆ 600+ Activities - Log and record workouts with the largest selection of activities, including running, cycling, walking, gym workouts, cross training, yoga and tons of others. ☆ Workout Stats - Record GPS-based workouts with customizable voice feedback for precise stats like pace, route, distance, calorie burn, elevation profile and more. SHARE FITNESS & NUTRITION DATA ☆ Share Data - Sync your account with other health and nutrition apps like MyFitnessPal and Google Fit. TRAIN LIKE A PRO WITH MVP MEMBERSHIP ☆ Go MVP - Be a premium member for an ad-free experience and access special features like heart rate analysis, personal training plans, audio coaching, and Live Tracking. ☆ MVP Members Only - Enjoy exclusive offers and promotions from our partners. JOIN THE COMMUNITY ☆ Activity Feed - Share your progress and see what friends are doing on your Activity Feed. Whether you’re a beginner, casually active, looking to rededicate yourself to fitness or an athletic enthusiast, you’ll fit in perfectly with our 30+ million member strong community. ☆ Social - Share your progress and workouts with friends on social media. MORE FEATURES ON THE WEB ☆ 24/7 Activity Graph - Connect devices to view steps, sleep, workouts and more, all in one expertly designed graph. ☆ Import Data - We make it easy to connect and import data from the best activity tracking devices in the industry. Connect devices from Jawbone, Misfit, Fitbit, Garmin, Withings and more (Bluetooth Smart™ and ANT+™). ☆ Challenges - Join Challenges for some friendly, virtual competition, climb the leaderboards and win prizes. Be sure to visit us at www.MapMyFitness.com for the full experience. Should you choose to upgrade to MVP, payment will be charged to your Google Wallet account at confirmation of purchase. The monthly subscription costs USD 5.99 per month while the yearly subscription costs USD 29.99 per year or USD 2.50 per month. Subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. There is no increase in cost when renewing. Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal turned off on wallet.google.com and click on ‘Update or cancel your subscription’ on the Transactions page after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be cancelled. Any unused portion of a free trial period is forfeited if you choose to purchase a subscription to MVP. Under Armour Connected Fitness powers the complete digital product suite of MapMyFitness, including MapMyRun, MapMyRide, MapMyWalk, MapMyHike, and the Under Armour Record app. Our mission is to make all athletes better by providing the digital connected fitness products they need to train, perform and improve. Find the full terms and conditions, and our privacy policy, at http://www.mapmyfitness.com/terms_of_use and http://about.mapmyfitness.com/about/user-privacy-policy/ respectively.
